author: Julia Musto
title: Rep. McCaul: China's leaders engineered the 'worst cover-up in human history' over coronavirus
description: Rep. Michael McCaul, R-Texas, asserted Thursday that the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) engaged in the "worst coverup in human history" by failing to adequately inform and protect their own people and the world from the coronavirus pandemic outbreak.
content:
